Aileen Li

Service Project Topic: "Reducing Transportation Pollution Through Youth Advocacy"

1 / 4
2 / 4
3 / 4
4 / 4


Youth Ambassador Profile



Purpose Statement

I am very interested in topics such as global warming and potential solutions to this problem. Because transportation is a major contributor to air pollution in our communities, I designed my project to help spread awareness about this issue. Hopefully awareness of this issue will motivate some members of my community to better take care of their carbon footprint and be mindful of their contributions to air pollution.


Final Project: "Reducing Traffic Pollution in Our Communities"

Source Links

National Geographic: The Environmental Impacts of Cars, Explained.

Environmental Protection Agency (EPA): Fast Facts on Transportation Greenhouse Gas Emissions.


Resources for Sustainability and Environmental Protection

Causes: Youth in Action asks, "How are youth funders and activists approaching critical issues facing the world today?" This resource takes an in-depth look at current funding data, strategies, and stories of youth working to effect change within each of the stated causes.

Youth Engaged 4 Change posts internship and learning opportunities for civic engagement.

The Teens Leading Change initiative has funded and launched nearly 20 projects across 24 branches including 8 projects across 11 branches that are happening now!
